BR_text.BRsummary: st.expander doesn't fade when app is rerunning
BR_text.BRdescription:
All Streamlit elements fade while an app is rerunning, except for st.beta_expander. We should fix that.
 <denchmark-h:h3>Steps to repro</denchmark-h>
 
 <denchmark-code>import streamlit as st
 import time
 
 time.sleep(10)
 
 st.title("Example")
 st.line_chart({"data": [1, 5, 2, 6, 2, 1]})
 
 with st.beta_expander("See explanation"):
     st.write("""
         The chart above shows some numbers I picked for you.
         I rolled actual dice for these, so they're *guaranteed* to
         be random.
     """)
     st.image("https://static.streamlit.io/examples/dice.jpg")
 </denchmark-code>
 
 
 Run the script above
 Rerun the script above by pressing "R"
 
  during the rerun, all on-screen elements fade while they update
  all components fade, except for the expander, which retains 100% opacity. See screenshot below.
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/690814/97551097-c3bea100-198f-11eb-9d6a-eb16443f851b.png></denchmark-link>
 
 Streamlit version: 0.70.0
